name: TVContentItemImageTrait
desc: Traits describing the type of image you want.

items.name: static var screenScale1x: TVContentItemImageTrait
items.desc: An image meant for a regular display.

items.name: static var screenScale2x: TVContentItemImageTrait
items.desc: An image meant for a Retina display.

items.name: static var userInterfaceStyleLight: TVContentItemImageTrait
items.desc: An image meant for a light user interface.
